text: The Men's 90 kg competition at the 2019 World Judo Championships was held on 29 August 2019.Schedule ==Results== ===Finals=== ===Repechage=== ===Pool A=== ;Preliminary round {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; font- size:90% " ! align="right" width="150"| !width="60"|Score !align="left" width="140"| |- |align=right|John Ferrer |align=center|00–10 |align=left| Eyale Le Beau |- |align=right|Celtus Dossou Yovo |align=center|00–10 |align=left| Harrison Cassar |} ===Pool B=== ;Preliminary round {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; font-size:90% " ! align="right" width="140"| !width="60"|Score !align="left" width="140"| |- |align=right|Jiří Petr |align=center|10–00 |align=left| Dāvis Dūda |} ===Pool C=== ;Preliminary round {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; font-size:90% " ! align="right" width="140"| !width="60"|Score !align="left" width="140"| |- |align=right|Yakhyo Imamov |align=center|01–10 |align=left| Marcus Nyman |} ===Pool D=== ;Preliminary round {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; font-size:90% " ! align="right" width="150"| !width="60"|Score !align="left" width="140"| |- |align=right|Nantenaina Finesse |align=center|00–10 |align=left| Peter Žilka |} ==References== ==External links== *Draw Men's 90 kg
title: 2019 World Judo Championships – Men's 90 kg
